name: KIN
overview: KIN is a part of a series of 3D games released by ECP and was intended to be played with 3D glasses included in the package. It's a single-screen platformer where you guide KIN through the caverns deep into the mountains. In order to progress you need to collect the key to unlock the door. The bubbles you see floating around will eventually burst and release demons, which you must shoot to destroy.
